abstract: Rackspace has become a partner with Amazon and Azure selling services and helping companies transport data and software to them.
snippet: Rackspace has become a partner with Amazon and Azure selling services and helping companies transport data and software to them.
lead_paragraph: Apollo Global Management and Searchlight Capital are making a $4.3 billion bet on capitulation.

headline.main: Small Cloud Computing Firm Turns to Helping Others Work With Giants
headline.print_headline: Rackspace Deal Carries Benefits and Risks

abstract: Abbott is acquiring Alere, which makes medical tests, and St. Jude Medical, which makes cardiovascular devices. The deals have been hampered by inquiries into sales practices and concerns over some devices being vulnerable to cyberattacks.
snippet: Abbott is acquiring Alere, which makes medical tests, and St. Jude Medical, which makes cardiovascular devices. The deals have been hampered by inquiries into sales practices and concerns over some devices being vulnerable to cyberattacks.
lead_paragraph: Abbott Laboratories has announced two large acquisitions over the last year. In recent days, both deals have become major land mines.

headline.main: Abbott’s No Good, Very Bad M&A Week
headline.print_headline: 2 Deals Turn Into 2 Headaches for Abbott Laboratories
